fullText: LaChanze delivers a powerhouse performance that anchors Alice Childress's prescient 1955 play about the indignities faced by Black actors in a white-dominated theater world.
dtliExcerpt: LaChanze delivers a powerhouse performance that anchors Alice Childress's prescient 1955 play about the indignities faced by Black actors in a white-dominated theater world.
